title.native: 聖飢魔II HUMANE SOCIETY ~人類愛に満ちた社会~
title.romaji: Seikima II HUMANE SOCIETY: Jinrui Ai ni Michita Shakai

description:
In the year 199X, mankind faces extinction due to frequent calamities like abnormal weather or huge insect swarms, caused by the power of the demons. However, Rosa, a woman with mysterious powers appears. Not only does she drive back all disasters, she is also revered as the savior of the world. The demons' leader, Demon, is not happy with this. For the sake of his plan to wipe out humanity, he starts the activation of the Tower of Babel, something which causes his life to be targeted by Rosa. On the other hand, Rosa has started the construction of the Tower of Cain. Now an all out battle which will decide the destiny of mankind begins..

(Source: Rough translation of the Japanese summary on Wikipedia)
synonyms: Seikima 2 Humane Society: Jinrui Ai ni Michita Shakai

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

node.description:
Jun Kamiya is an anime director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/junkamiya)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1522114648098619397)

He grew up admiring anime such as [Space Battleship Yamato](https://anilist.co/anime/1650/) an during highschool he started animating with his friends. He enrolled into a professional animation school after graduating but quit quickly due to being disappointed in how the lessons were conducted.

He joined Anime R and later its subsidiary Studio Muu. His first work was as an in-betweener on [Psycho Armor Govarian](https://anilist.co/anime/6428/) while his debut as a key animator was on [Captain Tsubasa](https://anilist.co/anime/2116/).

After working on [Mamoru Oshii](https://anilist.co/staff/99097/)'s [Patlabor](https://anilist.co/anime/1095/) he permanently joined Production I.G. becoming known, together with [Hiroyuki Okiura](https://anilist.co/staff/103502/) and [Tetsuya Nishio](https://anilist.co/staff/103725/), as "The Three Gods of I.G."

He's is one of the most prominent animators of the realist school, with emphasis on solid shapes and weighty character animation.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1522114648098619397)

He grew up admiring anime such as [Space Battleship Yamato](https://anilist.co/anime/1650/) an during highschool he started animating with his friends. He enrolled into a professional animation school after graduating but quit quickly due to being disappointed in how the lessons were conducted.

He joined Anime R and later its subsidiary Studio Muu. His first work was as an in-betweener on [Psycho Armor Govarian](https://anilist.co/anime/6428/) while his debut as a key animator was on [Captain Tsubasa](https://anilist.co/anime/2116/).

After working on [Mamoru Oshii](https://anilist.co/staff/99097/)'s [Patlabor](https://anilist.co/anime/1095/) he permanently joined Production I.G. becoming known, together with [Hiroyuki Okiura](https://anilist.co/staff/103502/) and [Tetsuya Nishio](https://anilist.co/staff/103725/), as "The Three Gods of I.G."

He's is one of the most prominent animators of the realist school, with emphasis on solid shapes and weighty character animation.

[Website](https://www.seikima-ii.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/seikima_ii35th) | [Sony Music](https://www.sonymusic.co.jp/artist/SeikimaII/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/seikima_ii/)

Japanese heavy metal band founded by [Demon Kogure](https://anilist.co/staff/106416). The band disbanded at the end of the century on December 31, 1999 at 23:59:59, but have since made several limited reunion appearances.

__Members:__
• His Excellency [Demon Kakka](https://anilist.co/staff/106416) (デーモン閣下) – vocals
• His Imperial Highness Raiden Yuzawa (ライデン湯沢殿下) – drums
• Doctor Xenon Ishikawa (ゼノン石川和尚) – bass, backing vocals
• Staff General Luke Takamura III (Sgt. ルーク篁III世参謀) – guitar, backing vocals
• Empire Magistrate Jail O'Hashi (ジェイル大橋代官) – guitar, backing vocals
• Captain Ace Shimizu (エース清水長官) – guitar (1983–1999, 2005), drums (1982–1983)

__Former members:__
• His Majesty Damian Hamada (ダミアン浜田) – guitar (1982–1985)
• Majo Ryoko (魔女RYO子嬢) – keyboards (1983)
• Giantonio Babayashi (ジャントニオ・ババヤシ) – guitar (1984)
• Zeed Iijima (ジード飯島大将) – drums (1983–1985)
• Gandhara Sangeria Tigris-Euphrates Kaneko (ガンダーラ・サンゲリア・チグリス・ユーフラテス金子) – guitar (1985; died 2012)
• Jagy Furukawa (ジャギ古川CAP) – drums (1985)
• Zod Hoshijima (ゾッド星島親分) – bass (1982–1986)

__Support members:__
• Wrector H (レクター・H) – keyboards (1992–1994)
• Yuichi Matsuzaki (怪人松崎様) – keyboards (1988–1992, 1994–1999, 2005, 2010, 2015–2016)

title.native: 聖飢魔II HUMANE SOCIETY ~人類愛に満ちた社会~
デトロイト・メタル・シティ
